Sentencas: Neodymium nickelate, with composition Nd2NiO4+delta is integrated as oxygen electrode in a solid oxide electrolyte supported cell made of a TZ3Y electrolyte and a Ni-CGO hydrogen electrode.
Titulo: A new anode material for solid oxide electrolyser: The neodymium nickelate Nd2NiO4+δ

Sentencas: This cell is tested in both fuel cell (SOFC) and electrolysis (SOEC) mode and the reversible operation is proven, ASR values being slightly lower in electrolysis mode.
Titulo: A new anode material for solid oxide electrolyser: The neodymium nickelate Nd2NiO4+δ

Sentencas: Performances in SOEC mode are compared with a commercial cell based on the same electrolyte and cathode, but with lanthanum strontium manganite (LSM) as anode.
Titulo: A new anode material for solid oxide electrolyser: The neodymium nickelate Nd2NiO4+δ

Sentencas: For a voltage of 1.3 V. current densities of 0.40, 0.64 and 0.87 A cm(-2) are measured at 750,800 and 850 degrees C, respectively; they are much higher than the ones measured in the same conditions for the LSM-containing cell, Indeed, for a voltage of 1.3 V, current densities are respectively 1.7, 3 and 4.2 times higher for the Nd2NiO4+delta cell than for the LSM one at 850, 800 and 750 degrees C, respectively.
Titulo: A new anode material for solid oxide electrolyser: The neodymium nickelate Nd2NiO4+δ

Sentencas: Consequently, Nd2NiO4+delta can be considered as a good candidate for operating below 800 degrees C as oxygen electrode for high temperature steam electrolysis.
Titulo: A new anode material for solid oxide electrolyser: The neodymium nickelate Nd2NiO4+δ
